about.details:
Incorporated in 2012, Ameya Engineers is engaged in the manufacturing of high-end precision components (shafts, and other trim components) for the general engineering industry. The company also offers specialized processes like hard-facing and overlay of wear and corrosion-resistant alloys in line with ASME procedures. The company has a manufacturing facility situated in Pune.

Ameya Engineers' major customers are valve and pump manufacturers. Over 95% of revenue comes from export. The company exports its products to the United States of America, United Kingdom, Germany, Singapore, Slovenija, Austria, and Brazil.

Ameya Engineers manufacture shafts/stems such as Gate Valves, Butterfly valves, Pumps, Flanges such as Valve Bonnets, Seats/ Discs, Plugs, and Hard Facing and Corrosion Resistant Overlays such as Stellite /Colmonoy, Valve Seats /Discs / Plugs and Pump Wear Rings.

faqs.question: What is the Ameya Engineers IPO?
faqs.answer:
Ameya Engineers IPO is a SME IPO of 2100000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹7.14 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹34 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on August 25, 2022, and closes on August 30, 2022.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Ameya Engineers IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Ameya Engineers IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Ameya Engineers IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Ameya Engineers IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Ameya Engineers IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Ameya Engineers IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Ameya Engineers IPO opens on August 25, 2022 and closes on August 30, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Ameya Engineers IPO?
faqs.answer: Ameya Engineers IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,36,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Ameya Engineers IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Ameya Engineers IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Ameya Engineers IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Ameya Engineers IPO will be done on Monday, September 5, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, September 7, 2022. Check the Ameya Engineers IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Ameya Engineers IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Ameya Engineers IPO listing date is on Thursday, September 8, 2022.
